scripts.build-wx: sh copy-build-js.sh && webpack --config build.wxgame.js && node tools/bin/main.js
scripts.fast-wx: sh copy-min-js.sh && webpack --config build.wxgame.js && node tools/bin/main.js
scripts.publish-wx: sh copy-min-js.sh && cd ../Eliminate && egret publish --target wxgame && cd - && webpack --config publish.wxgame.js && node tools/bin/main.js
